alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 7:09PM CDT until July 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Elmore. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Millbrook, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Eclectic, Santuck, Dexter, Blue Ridge, Ten Cedar Estates, Emerald Mountain, Jordan Lake, Weoka Mills, Titus, Western Lake Martin, Kowaliga Bridge, Martin Dam, Southern Lake Martin and Claud.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
